title: Roses
description: Classic, versatile flowers known for their fragrance and elegance, ideal for romantic gestures.
weather: Best in moderate climates; avoid extreme heat or frost.

title: Daisies
description: Bright, cheerful flowers perfect for casual arrangements and bringing joy to any setting.
benefits: Great for indoor and outdoor arrangements
weather: Prefers cooler temperatures, ideal in spring and early summer.

title: Lavender
description: Known for its calming scent, lavender is perfect for relaxation and stress relief.
benefits: Can be used dried or fresh
weather: Thrives in warm, sunny climates with well-drained soil.

title: Wildflowers
description: A mix of native flowers that bring a rustic, natural charm to arrangements.
weather: Adaptable to a wide range of climates, suitable for wild landscapes.
